thread.title: Revealed: Black Queens stay at the M-Plaza hotel cost $37,000
thread.title_full: Revealed: Black Queens stay at the M-Plaza hotel cost $37,000

title: Revealed: Black Queens stay at the M-Plaza hotel cost $37,000
text:
Sports News | 2 October 2015 10:40 CET Revealed: Black Queens stay at the M-Plaza hotel cost $37,000 - www.ghanasoccernet.com The Black Queens of Ghana 
The Ministry of Youth and Sports is to pay about $37,000 as cost for the nine-day stay of the Black Queens at the M-Plaza Hotel. 
According to reports, the 28-member contingent, comprising 20 players, eight officials were billed $150 per night at a discount for nine days, which works up to $1350 per person and $37,800 in total. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
